column2: BRIEF-Modine Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.34 May 23 (Reuters) - Modine Manufacturing Co: * MODINE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * SEES 2019 FULL FISCAL YEAR-OVER-YEAR SALES UP 3 TO 8 PERCENT * “ANTICIPATE THAT CONTINUED STRENGTH IN OUR END MARKETS WILL DRIVE FURTHER SALES AND EARNINGS GROWTH IN FISCAL 2019” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
